sentences.sentence: So far, only superstring theory can solve this key problem.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止，只有超弦理论能解决这个关键问题。

sentences.sentence: It may even help to indirectly test some components of superstring theory.
sentences.translation: 它甚至有助于对超弦理论的某些方面进行间接的检测。

sentences.sentence: Superstring theories take this idea and build the entire universe from the bottom up.
sentences.translation: 超弦理论以这个观点为基础，并从下向上构筑了整个宇宙。
